item_category: The OPPO A15 packs a punch with a versatile triple rear camera up to 13MP. A large 6.5" display for ease of use and fast 3GB RAM And 32GB storage to keep all your important files safe.
review_title: Excellent features in entry level smartphone seris
Good phone, for a good price
I bought this phone it's brilliant
Excellent value for a android phone
Works perfect amazing camera and screen huge
Looks ok and performs as should

Good phone. Great value for money. Big screen and long battery life
I bought this phone for my partner and it's brilliant
I mainly use it for gaming as my other phone is good for other things but not gaming so I now have a good gaming product plus a fabulous camera excellent phone
I bought the Mystery Blue version and very happy with the phone. Very satisfied.

The phone is very stylish and modern it has an excellent responsive touch screen the sound and the picture quality is very good its packed with features that are easy to use you can also add extra storage to the phone for more memory it connects easy to your wifi and gadgets
Excellent battery life and good example of big features in lesser price and phone build quality is also one of the highlight , nothing to complain as of now
This phone does everything you need it to do and more, amazing battery life, great quality camera , would recommend
Sooo good works vv well.nice apps
I like this phone , don't need an expensive one I only use it for calls and YouTube .I like its colour,battery ok , my favourite mode while taking pictures is "portrait"

I bought this for my son and my 83 year old aunt and they are both he ivery happy with brand. My aunt is recommending it to all her friends because she finds it easy due to the features and my son is enjoying all the features that comes with the phone. Good phone for the price.

The phone has amazing features. The size, colour,  battery and camera are the best. 
I love my phone!
Well worth the money and extremely happy with the phone.

The oppo A15 is fantastic,it can do everything just as well as all the other phones you get on the market, well made slim,and the colour is great, 10/10. Highly recommended it ,,

Great cheap phone, does all the phone stuff you'd expect, feels more expensive than it is.. Good quality and well built. Hope this one last longer than a year as my kids seem to destroy phones for fun.. TBC.

It's ok for the money but I don't think it's anything special also the battery life is average, one thing to be aware of the theme store is not available in UK which is one thing I bought it for so bit disappointed there , not a bad device by any means but it's average. Think I'll get a Motorola instead.
